Àtụ:Infobox film
Maazị Funnybone bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị na Hong Kong nke 1976 nke Kuei Chih-Hung duziri dabere na manhua, Old Master Q, nke Alfonso Wong, onye sokwa dee edemede eji mebe ya bu ihe nkiri ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ, yana Wang Sha dị ka onye isi
Ihe nkiri ahụ sochiri ihe nkiri ọzọ, Maazị Funnybone Strikes Again, nke pụtara ìhè na 1978.
